Desc.entry: Offers the opportunity for children and young people aged 18 years and under to meet and perform with other young musicians. Regular prestigious concerts are given throughout the year and senior ensembles undertake national and international tours. Runs 18 ensembles meeting at the Bannerdale Centre during term-time, including several bands for young musicians at different grades: Brassed On Community Brass Band (see separate entry), Young Blowers Wind Band, Bannerdale Band and Festival Band. Also organises groups based in the North of Sheffield at Old Firth Park Library: Sing Out Primary School Choir, Sing Out Community Choir (see separate entry), North Area String Orchestra and Community Wind Group. Also runs other specialist groups for clarinet, flute and percussion.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.45am-5.15pm (office hours), rehearsals term-time only, please contact for details

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 3.45-4.45pm (Sing Out Primary School Choir), 4-5pm (North Area String Orchestra), 4.30-5.30pm (Brassed On Community Brass Band), 5-6pm (Sing Out Community Choir), 5-6.15pm (Community Wind Group)
